# PATCH /v1/gameCenterLeaderboards/{id}/relationships/activity | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

- [ PATCH /v1/gameCenterLeaderboards/{id}/relationships/activity ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/patch-v1-gamecenterleaderboards-_id_-relationships-activity)

-  PATCH /v1/gameCenterLeaderboards/{id}/relationships/activity 

Web Service Endpoint# PATCH /v1/gameCenterLeaderboards/{id}/relationships/activity

App Store Connect API 3.6+## [URL](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/patch-v1-gamecenterleaderboards-_id_-relationships-activity#url)



```
PATCH https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/gameCenterLeaderboards/{id}/relationships/activity
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/patch-v1-gamecenterleaderboards-_id_-relationships-activity#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [HTTP Body](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/patch-v1-gamecenterleaderboards-_id_-relationships-activity#http-body)

`[GameCenterLeaderboardActivityLinkageRequest`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/gamecenterleaderboardactivitylinkagerequest)

 Content-Type: application/json ## [Response Codes](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/patch-v1-gamecenterleaderboards-_id_-relationships-activity#response-codes)

` 204 No Content``No Content`

` 401 Unauthorized``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Unauthorized`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 403 Forbidden``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Forbidden`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 404 Not Found``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Not Found`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 409 Conflict``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Conflict`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 422 ``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)``

 Content-Type: application/json ` 429 ``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)``

 Content-Type: application/json ## [ Mentioned in ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/patch-v1-gamecenterleaderboards-_id_-relationships-activity#mentions)

### [Creating, modifying, and deleting leaderboards](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/patch-v1-gamecenterleaderboards-_id_-relationships-activity#Creating-modifying-and-deleting-leaderboards)

[`Create a leaderboard`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/post-v1-gamecenterleaderboards)Add a new leaderboard to your app.[`Edit a leaderboard`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/patch-v1-gamecenterleaderboards-_id_)Modify the details of a leaderboard.[`Edit the relationship between a leaderboard and a group leaderboard`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/patch-v1-gamecenterleaderboards-_id_-relationships-groupleaderboard)Modify the group leadboard to which a leaderboard belongs.[`PATCH /v1/gameCenterLeaderboards/{id}/relationships/challenge`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/patch-v1-gamecenterleaderboards-_id_-relationships-challenge)[`Delete a leaderboard`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/delete-v1-gamecenterleaderboards-_id_)Delete a leaderboard from your app.
